summary.span: 表示對 SQL Server 資料庫的連線。

span.span: Represents a connection to a SQL Server database.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件表示 SQL Server 資料來源的唯一工作階段。A object represents a unique session to a SQL Server data source. 具有用戶端/伺服器資料庫系統，它相當於伺服器的網路連線。With a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server. 會搭配和來連接到 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫時，提升效能。 is used together with and to increase performance when connecting to a Microsoft SQL Server database. 所有協力廠商的 SQL Server 產品和其他的 OLE DB 支援的資料來源，請使用。For all third-party SQL Server products and other OLE DB-supported data sources, use . 當您建立的執行個體，所有屬性都設為其初始值。When you create an instance of , all properties are set to their initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 請參閱中的連接字串關鍵字的清單。See for a list of the keywords in a connection string. 如果移出的範圍，它將不會關閉。If the goes out of scope, it won't be closed. 因此，您必須明確地關閉此連接呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`. `Close` 和`Dispose`相同的功能。`Close` and `Dispose` are functionally equivalent. 如果連接共用值`Pooling`設`true`或`yes`、 基礎連接已傳回到連接集區。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, the underlying connection is returned back to the connection pool. 相反地，如果`Pooling`設`false`或`no`，實際上關閉基礎連線到伺服器。On the other hand, if `Pooling` is set to `false` or `no`, the underlying connection to the server is actually closed. > [!NOTE] > 從連接集區中擷取連接或將連接傳回連接集區時，系統不會在伺服器上引發登入和登出事件，因為當連接傳回連接集區時，連接實際上並未關閉。Login and logout events will not be raised on the server when a connection is fetched from or returned to the connection pool, because the connection is not actually closed when it is returned to the connection pool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). 若要確保永遠關閉的連線，開啟 內部連接`using`區塊，如下列程式碼片段所示。To ensure that connections are always closed, open the connection inside of a `using` block, as shown in the following code fragment. 這樣可以確保程式碼結束該區塊時，自動關閉連線。Doing so ensures that the connection is automatically closed when the code exits the block. ```vb Using connection As New SqlConnection(connectionString) connection.Open() ' Do work here; connection closed on following line. End Using ``` ```csharp using (SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection(connectionString)) { connection.Open(); // Do work here; connection closed on following line. } ``` > [!NOTE] > 若要部署高效能應用程式，您必須使用連接共用。To deploy high-performance applications, you must use connection pooling. 當您使用.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 時，您不必啟用連接共用，因為提供者會自動管理雖然您可以修改某些設定。When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically, although you can modify some settings. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). 如果所執行的方法產生、仍保持開啟時的嚴重性層級為 19 或更少。If a is generated by the method executing a , the remains open when the severity level is 19 or less. 伺服器的嚴重性層級 20 或以上時，通常會關閉。When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server ordinarily closes the . 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 建立的執行個體的應用程式物件可能會要求所有直接和間接呼叫端擁有足夠的權限的程式碼所設定的宣告式或必要的安全性要求。An application that creates an instance of the object can require all direct and indirect callers to have sufficient permission to the code by setting declarative or imperative security demands. 可使用的安全性要求物件。 makes security demands using the object. 使用者可以確認他們的程式碼使用具有足夠的權限物件。Users can verify that their code has sufficient permissions by using the object. 使用者和系統管理員也可以使用[Caspol.exe （程式碼存取安全性原則工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)修改電腦、 使用者和企業層級的安全性原則。Users and administrators can also use the [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md) to modify security policy at the machine, user, and enterprise levels. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6)。For more information, see [Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6). 如需示範如何使用安全性要求的範例，請參閱[程式碼存取安全性和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。For an example demonstrating how to use security demands, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md). 如需處理來自伺服器的警告和告知性訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱[連接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information about handling warning and informational messages from the server, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md). SQL Server 引擎錯誤與錯誤訊息會記錄在 SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中。SQL Server engine errors and error messages are documented in SQL Server Books Online. > [!CAUTION] > 您可以強制 TCP，而非共用的記憶體。You can force TCP instead of shared memory. 您可以執行此動作 tcp 前面加上： 在連接中的伺服器名稱的字串，或者您可以使用 localhost。You can do that by prefixing tcp: to the server name in the connection string or you can use localhost. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 已開啟，並設定為如。The is opened and set as the for the . 此範例會接著呼叫。The example then calls . 若要達成此目的，連接字串和查詢字串傳遞至[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]INSERT 陳述式。To accomplish this, the is passed a connection string and a query string that is a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] INSERT statement. 使用的程式碼結束時自動關閉連接區塊。The connection is closed automatically when the code exits the using block. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令將對應至 SQL Server 實作的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION. 您必須明確地認可或回復交易使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要確定.NET Framework 資料提供者，SQL Server 交易管理模型會正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如 SQL Server 提供的。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不指定隔離等級，則會使用預設隔離等級。If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level is used. 若要指定隔離等級方法，使用的多載，`iso`參數 ()。To specify an isolation level with the method, use the overload that takes the `iso` parameter (). 設定交易的隔離等級會保存在交易完成之後，直到關閉或處置連接。The isolation level set for a transaction persists after the transaction is completed and until the connection is closed or disposed. 隔離層級設定為**快照**中未啟用快照隔離等級的資料庫不會擲回例外狀況。Setting the isolation level to **Snapshot** in a database where the snapshot isolation level is not enabled does not throw an exception. 完成交易使用的預設隔離等級。The transaction will complete using the default isolation level. > [!CAUTION] > 如果啟動交易層級 16 或更高的錯誤，就會發生在伺服器上，交易將不會回復直到叫用方法。If a transaction is started and a level 16 or higher error occurs on the server, the transaction will not be rolled back until the method is invoked. 會擲回任何例外狀況**ExecuteReader**。No exception is thrown on **ExecuteReader**. > [!CAUTION] > 當您的查詢傳回大量的資料和呼叫`BeginTransaction`、因為 SQL Server 不允許平行交易使用 MARS 時，會擲回。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免這個問題，一律關聯交易命令、 連線，或兩者都開啟任何讀取器之前。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. 如需有關 SQL Server 異動的詳細資訊，請參閱《SQL Server 線上叢書》中的「外顯異動」和「撰寫有效率的異動」。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in SQL Server Books Online. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用、 ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令將對應至 SQL Server 實作的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION. 您必須明確地認可或回復交易使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要確定.NET Framework 資料提供者，SQL Server 交易管理模型會正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如 SQL Server 提供的。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 認可或回復交易之後，交易的隔離等級會持續處於自動認可模式 （SQL Server 預設值） 的所有後續命令。After a transaction is committed or rolled back, the isolation level of the transaction persists for all subsequent commands that are in autocommit mode (the SQL Server default). 這會產生非預期的結果，例如保存和鎖定的資料列外的其他使用者 REPEATABLE READ 隔離等級。This can produce unexpected results, such as an isolation level of REPEATABLE READ persisting and locking other users out of a row. 若要重設預設 （讀取認可） 的隔離等級，執行[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]設定交易隔離等級 READ COMMITTED 陳述式或呼叫立即接著。To reset the isolation level to the default (READ COMMITTED), execute the [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED statement, or call followed immediately by . 如需有關 SQL Server 隔離層級的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 隔離層級在 Database Engine > SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中。For more information on SQL Server isolation levels, see "Isolation Levels in the Database Engine" in SQL Server Books Online. 如需有關 SQL Server 異動的詳細資訊，請參閱《SQL Server 線上叢書》中的「外顯異動」和「撰寫有效率的異動」。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in SQL Server Books Online. > [!CAUTION] > 當您的查詢傳回大量的資料和呼叫`BeginTransaction`、因為 SQL Server 不允許平行交易使用 MARS 時，會擲回。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免這個問題，一律關聯交易命令、 連線，或兩者都開啟任何讀取器之前。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用、 ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令將對應至 SQL Server 實作的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION. 長度`transactionName`參數必須不能超過 32 個字元，否則會擲回例外狀況。The length of the `transactionName` parameter must not exceed 32 characters; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 中的值`transactionName`參數可以用於稍後呼叫和`savePoint`參數方法。The value in the `transactionName` parameter can be used in later calls to and in the `savePoint` parameter of the method. 您必須明確地認可或回復交易使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要確定[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]資料提供者的 SQL Server 交易管理模式執行正確，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如 SQL Server 提供的。To make sure that the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server. 如需有關 SQL Server 異動的詳細資訊，請參閱《SQL Server 線上叢書》中的「外顯異動」和「撰寫有效率的異動」。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in SQL Server Books Online. > [!CAUTION] > 當您的查詢傳回大量的資料和呼叫`BeginTransaction`、因為 SQL Server 不允許平行交易使用 MARS 時，會擲回。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免這個問題，一律關聯交易命令、 連線，或兩者都開啟任何讀取器之前。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用、 ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令將對應至 SQL Server 實作的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION. 中的值`transactionName`參數可以用於稍後呼叫和`savePoint`參數方法。The value in the `transactionName` parameter can be used in later calls to and in the `savePoint` parameter of the method. 您必須明確地認可或回復交易使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要確定 SQL Server 交易管理模型會正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如 SQL Server 提供的。To make sure that the SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 認可或回復交易之後，交易的隔離等級會持續處於自動認可模式 （SQL Server 預設值） 的所有後續命令。After a transaction is committed or rolled back, the isolation level of the transaction persists for all subsequent commands that are in autocommit mode (the SQL Server default). 這會產生非預期的結果，例如保存和鎖定的資料列外的其他使用者 REPEATABLE READ 隔離等級。This can produce unexpected results, such as an isolation level of REPEATABLE READ persisting and locking other users out of a row. 若要重設預設 （讀取認可） 的隔離等級，執行[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]設定交易隔離等級 READ COMMITTED 陳述式或呼叫立即接著。To reset the isolation level to the default (READ COMMITTED), execute the [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED statement, or call followed immediately by . 如需有關 SQL Server 隔離層級的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 隔離層級在 Database Engine > SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中。For more information on SQL Server isolation levels, see "Isolation Levels in the Database Engine" in SQL Server Books Online. 如需有關 SQL Server 異動的詳細資訊，請參閱《SQL Server 線上叢書》中的「外顯異動」和「撰寫有效率的異動」。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in SQL Server Books Online. > [!CAUTION] > 當您的查詢傳回大量的資料和呼叫`BeginTransaction`、因為 SQL Server 不允許平行交易使用 MARS 時，會擲回。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免這個問題，一律關聯交易命令、 連線，或兩者都開啟任何讀取器之前。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用、 ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Changes the SQL Server password for the user indicated in the connection string to the supplied new password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用 SQL Server 在 Windows Server 上時，開發人員可以利用可讓用戶端應用程式，提供目前和新的密碼，才能變更現有密碼的功能。When you are using SQL Server on Windows Server, developers can take advantage of functionality that lets the client application supply both the current and a new password in order to change the existing password. 應用程式可以實作功能，例如初始登入期間提示使用者輸入新密碼，如果舊的密碼已過期，而且可以完成這項作業，而不需系統管理員介入。Applications can implement functionality such as prompting the user for a new password during initial login if the old one has expired, and this operation can be completed without administrator intervention. 方法變更使用者指示中所提供的 SQL Server 密碼`connectionString`參數中提供的值來`newPassword`參數。The method changes the SQL Server password for the user indicated in the supplied `connectionString` parameter to the value supplied in the `newPassword` parameter. 如果連接字串會包含整合式安全性的選項 (也就是 「 整合式的安全性 = True"或同等權限)，會擲回例外狀況。If the connection string includes the option for integrated security (that is, "Integrated Security=True" or the equivalent), an exception is thrown. 若要判斷已過期的密碼，呼叫方法會引發。To determine that the password has expired, calling the method raises a . 表示是否包含在連接字串的密碼必須重設，以便例外狀況的屬性包含狀態值 18487 或 18488。In order to indicate that the password that is contained within the connection string must be reset, the property for the exception contains the status value 18487 or 18488. 第一個值 (18487) 表示的密碼已過期的第二個 (18488) 表示登入之前，必須重設密碼。The first value (18487) indicates that the password has expired and the second (18488) indicates that the password must be reset before logging in. 這個方法會開啟它自己的伺服器連接、 要求密碼變更，並關閉連接，因為它已完成。This method opens its own connection to the server, requests the password change, and closes the connection as soon as it has completed. 此連線不擷取，也不會傳回 SQL Server 連接集區。This connection is not retrieved from, nor returned to, the SQL Server connection pool. ## Examples 變更密碼的簡單範例如下：The following is a simple example of changing a password: ``` class Program { static void Main(string[] args) { System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword( "Data Source=a_server;Initial Catalog=a_database;UID=user;PWD=old_password", "new_password"); } } ``` ``` Module Module1 Sub Main() System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword( "Data Source=a_server;Initial Catalog=a_database;UID=user;PWD=old_password", "new_password") End Sub End Module ``` 下列主控台應用程式示範如何變更使用者的密碼，因為目前的密碼已過期的相關問題。The following console application demonstrates the issues involved in changing a user's password because the current password has expired. remarks.format: ## Remarks 連線的伺服器版本為何，都會運作，但擴充的事件記錄檔以及有關連接性信號緩衝錯誤的項目將不會出現在[!INCLUDE[sskatmai_r2](~/includes/sskatmai-r2-md.md)]及更早版本。 works regardless of which version of the server you connect to, but extended events logs and entry on connectivity ring buffer errors will not be present in [!INCLUDE[sskatmai_r2](~/includes/sskatmai-r2-md.md)] and earlier. 若要查看失敗是否在伺服器上已啟用擴充的事件記錄連接識別碼，是否擴充的事件記錄檔中，您可以找到連接識別碼。You can locate the connection ID in the extended events log to see if the failure was on the server if the extended event for logging connection ID is enabled. 您也可以在連接信號緩衝區中找到的連接識別碼 ([連接 SQL Server 2008 中與連接信號緩衝區疑難排解](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=207752)) 針對特定連接錯誤。You can also locate the connection ID in the connection ring buffer ([Connectivity troubleshooting in SQL Server 2008 with the Connectivity Ring Buffer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=207752)) for certain connection errors. 如果連接識別碼不在連接信號緩衝區中，您可以假設發生網路錯誤。If the connection ID is not in the connection ring buffer, you can assume a network error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉與資料庫的連接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

summary.span: 這是關閉任何開啟連接的慣用方法。

span.span: This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會回復任何暫止交易。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然後，它會釋放連接集區中，連接或關閉連接，如果連接共用已停用。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. > [!NOTE] > 暫止的交易會使用啟動[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]或啟用連接共用時，會重設連接時自動交易回復。Pending transactions started using [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] or are automatically rolled back when the connection is reset if connection pooling is enabled. 如果連接共用已關閉，交易會復原之後`SqlConnection.Close`呼叫。If connection pooling is off, the transaction is rolled back after `SqlConnection.Close` is called. 透過啟動交易透過控制`System.Transactions`基礎結構，並不會受到`SqlConnection.Close`。Transactions started through are controlled through the `System.Transactions` infrastructure, and are not affected by `SqlConnection.Close`. 應用程式可以呼叫一次以上。An application can call more than one time. 會不產生任何例外狀況。No exception is generated. 如果移出的範圍，它將不會關閉。If the goes out of scope, it won't be closed. 因此，您必須明確地關閉此連接呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`. `Close` 和`Dispose`相同的功能。`Close` and `Dispose` are functionally equivalent. 如果連接共用值`Pooling`設`true`或`yes`、 基礎連接已傳回到連接集區。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, the underlying connection is returned back to the connection pool. 相反地，如果`Pooling`設`false`或`no`，就會關閉基礎連線到伺服器。On the other hand, if `Pooling` is set to `false` or `no`, the underlying connection to the server is closed. > [!NOTE] > 從連接集區中擷取連接或將連接傳回連接集區時，系統不會在伺服器上引發登入和登出事件，因為當連接傳回連接集區時，連接實際上並未關閉。Login and logout events will not be raised on the server when a connection is fetched from or returned to the connection pool, because the connection is not actually closed when it is returned to the connection pool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). > [!CAUTION] > 請勿呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`連線、 DataReader 或在任何其他 managed 的物件上`Finalize`類別的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在完成項中，您應該只需釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果類別未擁有任何 Unmanaged 資源，請不要在類別定義中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[回收](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9). ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 開啟、 顯示的某些屬性。The following example creates a , opens it, displays some of its properties. 連線會自動關閉的結尾`using`區塊。The connection is automatically closed at the end of the `using` block. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否要針對根據已啟用 [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) 的資料庫執行的參數化查詢，啟用 (true) 或停用 (false) 查詢中繼資料快取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether query metadata caching is enabled (true) or not (false) for parameterized queries running against [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) enabled databases.

summary.span: 預設值為 true。

span.span: The default value is true.

value.span: 如果已啟用查詢中繼資料快取，即會傳回 true；否則為 false。

span.span: Returns true if query metadata caching is enabled; otherwise false.

value.span: true 為預設值。

span.span: true is the default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數化查詢，SqlClient 會往返到 SQL Server 的參數中繼資料，以查看哪個參數需要加密和方式 （哪些金鑰和演算法應該使用）。For parameterized queries, SqlClient makes a roundtrip to SQL Server for parameter metadata, to see which parameter it needs to encrypt and how (which keys and algorithms should be used). 如果應用程式會多次呼叫同一個查詢，額外的往返是對伺服器應用程式的效能會降低每一次。If the application calls the same query multiple times, an extra roundtrip is made to the server each time, which degrades application performance. 與**ColumnEncryptionQueryMetadataCacheEnabled**設定為 true，如果相同的查詢會呼叫多次，往返於伺服器不會進行一次。With **ColumnEncryptionQueryMetadataCacheEnabled** set to true, if the same query is called multiple times, the roundtrip to the server will be made only once. 快取的不可設定的最大大小參數設為 2000年查詢。The cache has a non-configurable Max size parameter that is set to 2000 queries.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ColumnEncryptionTrustedMasterKeyPaths As IDictionary(Of String, IList(Of String))

summary.span: 可讓您為資料庫伺服器設定受信任機碼路徑的清單。

span.span: Allows you to set a list of trusted key paths for a database server.

summary.span: 如果在處理應用程式查詢時，驅動程式收到的機碼路徑不在清單上，查詢就會失敗。

span.span: If while processing an application query the driver receives a key path that is not on the list, the query will fail.

summary.span: 這個屬性會提供額外的保護以對抗安全性攻擊，事關受危害的 SQL Server 提供虛構的機碼路徑，這有可能導致金鑰存放區認證洩漏。

span.span: This property provides additional protection against security attacks that involve a compromised SQL Server providing fake key paths, which may lead to leaking key store credentials.

value.span: 資料行加密的受信任的主要機碼路徑清單。

span.span: The list of trusted master key paths for the column encryption.

summary.span: 取得或設定用來開啟 SQL Server 資料庫的字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open a SQL Server database.

value.span: 連接字串，包含來源資料庫名稱和其他建立初始連接所需要的參數。

span.span: The connection string that includes the source database name, and other parameters needed to establish the initial connection.

value.span: 預設值為空字串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類似於 OLE DB 連接字串，但並不相同。The is similar to an OLE DB connection string, but is not identical. 不同於 OLE DB 或 ADO，連接字串，則會傳回等同於使用者設定，減去 Persist Security Info 值設定為時的安全性資訊`false`（預設值）。Unlike OLE DB or ADO, the connection string that is returned is the same as the user-set , minus security information if the Persist Security Info value is set to `false` (default). .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 不會保存或傳回連接字串中的密碼，除非您設定 Persist Security Info `true`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not persist or return the password in a connection string unless you set Persist Security Info to `true`. 您可以使用內容，連接至資料庫。You can use the property to connect to a database. 下列範例說明一般連接字串。The following example illustrates a typical connection string. ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=true;Initial Catalog=Northwind;server=(local)" ``` 使用新在執行階段建構有效的連接字串。Use the new to construct valid connection strings at run time. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[連接字串產生器](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md)。For more information, see [Connection String Builders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md). 連接關閉時，才可以設定屬性。The property can be set only when the connection is closed. 許多連接字串值都有對應的唯讀屬性。Many of the connection string values have corresponding read-only properties. 當連接字串設定時，這些內容更新時，偵測到錯誤時除外。When the connection string is set, these properties are updated, except when an error is detected. 在此情況下，會更新任何屬性。In this case, none of the properties are updated. 屬性會傳回中所包含的那些設定。 properties return only those settings that are contained in the . 若要連接到本機電腦上，指定 「 （本機） 」 伺服器。To connect to a local computer, specify "(local)" for the server. 如果未指定伺服器名稱，連接將會嘗試在本機電腦上的預設執行個體。If a server name is not specified, a connection will be attempted to the default instance on the local computer. 重設關閉的連接會重設所有連接字串值 （和相關的屬性） 包括密碼。Resetting the on a closed connection resets all connection string values (and related properties) including the password. 比方說，如果您設定連接字串，包含 「 資料庫 = AdventureWorks"，然後重設連接字串 」 資料來源 = myserver; 整合式的安全性 = true"，則屬性不再設定為 「 AdventureWorks 」。For example, if you set a connection string that includes "Database= AdventureWorks", and then reset the connection string to "Data Source=myserver;Integrated Security=true", the property is no longer set to "AdventureWorks". 連接字串會剖析之後立即設定。The connection string is parsed immediately after being set. 如果剖析時，執行階段例外狀況，例如發現語法錯誤，就會產生。If errors in syntax are found when parsing, a runtime exception, such as , is generated. 嘗試開啟連接時，才可以找到其他錯誤。Other errors can be found only when an attempt is made to open the connection. 連接字串的基本格式包含一系列以分號隔開的關鍵字/值組。The basic format of a connection string includes a series of keyword/value pairs separated by semicolons. 等號 (=) 會連接每個關鍵字和其值。The equal sign (=) connects each keyword and its value. 若要加入包含分號、 單引號字元或雙引號字元的值，值必須括在雙引號中。To include values that contain a semicolon, single-quote character, or double-quote character, the value must be enclosed in double quotation marks. 如果值包含分號和雙引號字元，該值可括在單引號中。If the value contains both a semicolon and a double-quote character, the value can be enclosed in single quotation marks. 單一引號也很有用，如果值以雙引號字元開頭的。The single quotation mark is also useful if the value starts with a double-quote character. 相反地，如果值以單引號開始，可以使用雙引號。Conversely, the double quotation mark can be used if the value starts with a single quotation mark. 如果值包含單引號和雙引號字元，用來括住值的引號字元必須加倍，每次出現的值內。If the value contains both single-quote and double-quote characters, the quotation mark character used to enclose the value must be doubled every time it occurs within the value. 若要包含上述或尾端空格的字串值中，值必須括在單引號或雙引號括住。To include preceding or trailing spaces in the string value, the value must be enclosed in either single quotation marks or double quotation marks. 會忽略任何開頭或尾端空格，整數、 布林值或列舉的值的周圍，即使以引號括住。Any leading or trailing spaces around integer, Boolean, or enumerated values are ignored, even if enclosed in quotation marks. 不過，在字串常值關鍵字或值的空格會保留。However, spaces within a string literal keyword or value are preserved. 單引號或雙引號可能使用的連接字串內使用的分隔符號 (例如，資料來源 = my'Server 或資料來源 = 我的 」 伺服器)，除非引號字元是在值中的第一個或最後一個字元。Single or double quotation marks may be used within a connection string without using delimiters (for example, Data Source= my'Server or Data Source= my"Server), unless a quotation mark character is the first or last character in the value. 關鍵字不區分大小寫。Keywords are not case sensitive. 下表列出中的關鍵字值的有效名稱。The following table lists the valid names for keyword values within the . 下列清單包含連接共用內的值的有效名稱。The following list contains the valid names for connection pooling values within the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). - 連線的存留期 （或 Load Balance Timeout）Connection Lifetime (or Load Balance Timeout) - EnlistEnlist - Max Pool SizeMax Pool Size - Min Pool SizeMin Pool Size - PoolingPooling 當您要設定關鍵字或連接共用需要布林值的值時，您可以使用 'yes' 而不是 'true' 和 'no' 而不是 'false'。When you are setting keyword or connection pooling values that require a Boolean value, you can use 'yes' instead of 'true', and 'no' instead of 'false'. 整數值會表示為字串。Integer values are represented as strings. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 會使用自己的通訊協定與 SQL Server 通訊。The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server uses its own protocol to communicate with SQL Server. 因此，它不支援使用 ODBC 資料來源名稱 (DSN) 連接到 SQL Server，因為它不會新增 ODBC 圖層時。Therefore, it does not support the use of an ODBC data source name (DSN) when connecting to SQL Server because it does not add an ODBC layer. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework Data provider for SQL Server 不支援通用資料連結 (UDL) 檔案。Universal data link (UDL) files are not supported for the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. > [!CAUTION] > 在此版本中，應用程式只有在建構連接字串，根據使用者輸入 （例如從對話方塊中，並將它附加至連接字串中擷取使用者識別碼和密碼資訊時） 時應謹慎小心。In this release, the application should use caution when constructing a connection string based on user input (for example when retrieving user ID and password information from a dialog box, and appending it to the connection string). 應用程式應該要確定使用者無法在這些值中內嵌的其他連接字串參數 (例如，輸入密碼做為"validpassword; 資料庫 = somedb"在嘗試附加至不同的資料庫)。The application should make sure that a user cannot embed additional connection string parameters in these values (for example, entering a password as "validpassword;database=somedb" in an attempt to attach to a different database). 如果您要建構根據使用者輸入的連接字串，請使用新，其驗證的連接字串，並且有助於消除這個問題。If you need to construct connection strings based on user input, use the new , which validates the connection string and helps to eliminate this problem. 請參閱[連接字串產生器](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Connection String Builders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md) for more information. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定屬性之前開啟連接。The following example creates a and sets the property before opening the connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.ConnectionString Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.ConnectionString Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.ConnectionString Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.ConnectionString Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用的逾時時間設定的連接所等待的時間量`Connect Timeout`或`Connection Timeout`連接字串中的關鍵字。You can set the amount of time a connection waits to time out by using the `Connect Timeout` or `Connection Timeout` keywords in the connection string. 值為 0 表示無限制，並應避免在因為連線嘗試會無限期等待。A value of 0 indicates no limit, and should be avoided in a because an attempt to connect waits indefinitely. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定`Connection Timeout`為 30 秒的連接字串中。The following example creates a and sets the `Connection Timeout` to 30 seconds in the connection string. 程式碼會開啟連接，並顯示主控台視窗中的屬性。The code opens the connection and displays the property in the console window. summary.span: 將指定的異動登記為分散式異動。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用編列到分散式交易中的方法。You can use the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體， **EnlistTransaction**利用中的可用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易，因此最好**EnlistDistributedTransaction**針對此目的。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 您可以繼續登記在現有的分散式的交易使用**EnlistDistributedTransaction**方法如果停用了自動登記。You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the **EnlistDistributedTransaction** method if auto-enlistment is disabled. 在現有的分散式交易中登記可確保，如果認可或回復交易，在資料來源的程式碼所做的修改也認可或回復的。Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction makes sure that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back. `EnlistDistributedTransaction` 如果傳回的例外狀況已經開始交易使用。`EnlistDistributedTransaction` returns an exception if the has already started a transaction using . 不過，如果交易是在資料來源上啟動本機交易 (例如，藉由明確執行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 陳述式使用物件)， **EnlistDistributedTransaction**回復本機交易，並要求在現有的分散式交易中編列。However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an object), **EnlistDistributedTransaction** rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested. 您不會收到通知，本機交易已回復，而且負責管理任何本機交易不使用啟動。You do not receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back, and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 要登記之現有 的參考。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 將指定的異動登記為分散式異動。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用編列到分散式交易中的方法。You can use the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體， **EnlistTransaction**利用中的可用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易，因此最好**EnlistDistributedTransaction**，它會使用**System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction**物件。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction**, which uses a **System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction** object. 它也會有稍微不同的語意： 在交易上明確地登記連接之後, 無法取消登錄或另一個交易中登記，直到第一筆交易完成為止。It also has slightly different semantics: once a connection is explicitly enlisted on a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes. 如需有關分散式交易的詳細資訊，請參閱[分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將至`true`，先前視為例外狀況現在會做為處理的錯誤事件。When you set to `true`, errors that were previously treated as exceptions are now handled as events. 會立即引發和處理事件處理常式的所有事件。All events fire immediately and are handled by the event handler. 如果是設`false`，然後事件處理程序的結尾。If is is set to `false`, then events are handled at the end of the procedure. > [!NOTE] > 錯誤嚴重性層級 17 或以上，會使伺服器停止處理該命令必須當做例外狀況處理。An error with a severity level of 17 or above that causes the server to stop processing the command needs to be handled as an exception. 在此情況下會擲回例外狀況，而不理會 事件中如何處理錯誤。In this case, an exception is thrown regardless of how the error is handled in the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[連接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information on working with events, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md). 如需有關 SQL Server 引擎所產生的錯誤的詳細資訊，請參閱 SQL Server 線上叢書 》。For more information on errors generated by the SQL Server engine, see SQL Server Books Online.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `restrictionValues`參數可以提供*n*深度的限制集合的特定集合所指定的值。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values, which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 若要設定值，指定的限制，而且未設定其他限制的值，您必須設前述限制`null`，然後放置在您想要指定的值限制為適當值。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to `null` and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 這個範例是"Tables"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果"Tables"集合的三個限制資料庫、 擁有者，而且資料表名稱，而您想要取回只有擁有者 「 卡爾"相關聯的資料表，您需要將下列值： null、"Carl"。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions--database, owner, and table name--and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", you need to pass in the following values: null, "Carl". 如果未傳入限制值，預設值會使用該限制。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 這是相同的對應與傳入`null`，不同於傳遞的參數值為空字串。This is the same mapping as passing in `null`, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在此情況下，則為空字串 ("") 會被視為指定參數的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. 程式碼範例示範，請參閱。For a code sample demonstrating , see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event InfoMessage As SqlInfoMessageEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 SQL Server 傳回警告或告知性訊息時。

span.span: Occurs when SQL Server returns a warning or informational message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要處理警告或資訊訊息伺服器所傳送的用戶端應該建立委託以接聽此事件。Clients that want to process warnings or informational messages sent by the server should create an delegate to listen to this event. 嚴重性為 10 的訊息時，就會發生事件或更少由 SQL Server。The event occurs when a message with a severity of 10 or less is returned by SQL Server. 嚴重性 11 到 20 之間的訊息會引發錯誤，而對嚴重性 20 原因連接關閉訊息。Messages that have a severity between 11 and 20 raise an error and messages that have a severity over 20 causes the connection to close. 如需有關 SQL Server 錯誤層級的詳細資訊，請參閱"Database Engine 錯誤嚴重性"SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中。For more information on SQL Server error levels, see "Database Engine Error Severities" in SQL Server Books Online. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[連接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information and an example, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md).

summary.span: 使用 所指定的屬性設定，開啟資料庫連接。

span.span: Opens a database connection with the property settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繪製從連接集區的開啟連接，如果有的話。The draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available. 否則，它會建立新的 SQL Server 執行個體的連接。Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to an instance of SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 如果移出的範圍，它不封閉。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，您必須明確地關閉此連接呼叫。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定當您嘗試連接到 SQL Server 和使用 TCP/IP，以外的通訊協定的執行個體的 1433年以外的通訊埠編號方法失敗。If you specify a port number other than 1433 when you are trying to connect to an instance of SQL Server and using a protocol other than TCP/IP, the method fails. 若要指定連接埠號碼 1433年以外，包含"server = machinename、 連接埠號碼 」 中的連接字串和使用 TCP/IP 通訊協定。To specify a port number other than 1433, include "server=machinename,port number" in the connection string, and use the TCP/IP protocol. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 需要使用 「 允許呼叫 unmanaged 組件 」 啟用的安全性權限 (與設`UnmanagedCode`) 若要開啟啟用 SQL 偵錯。The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server requires the Security permission with "Allows calls to unmanaged assemblies" enabled ( with set to `UnmanagedCode`) to open a with SQL Debugging enabled. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，隨即開啟，並顯示其部分屬性。The following example creates a , opens it, and displays some of its properties. 連線會自動關閉的結尾`using`區塊。The connection is automatically closed at the end of the `using` block. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呼叫，必須傳回直到傳回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然後，如果連接成功，必須傳回。Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果連接失敗，必須傳回。If the connection fails, must return . 呼叫會嘗試取消，或關閉對應呼叫。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 如需在.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PacketSize As Integer
public: property int PacketSize { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得用來與 SQL Server 執行個體通訊的網路封包大小 (位元組)。

span.span: Gets the size (in bytes) of network packets used to communicate with an instance of SQL Server.

value.span: 網路封包的大小 (位元組)。

span.span: The size (in bytes) of network packets.

value.span: 預設值為 8000。

span.span: The default value is 8000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果應用程式執行大量複製作業，或傳送或接收大量的 text 或 image 的資料，則大於預設值可能會改善效率，因為這會導致較少的網路封包讀取和寫入作業。If an application performs bulk copy operations, or sends or receives lots of text or image data, a packet size larger than the default may improve efficiency because it causes fewer network read and write operations. 如果應用程式傳送與接收資訊的資訊量很少，您可以設定封包大小為 512 位元組 (使用中的封包大小值)，即足以應付大部分的資料傳輸作業。If an application sends and receives small amounts of information, you can set the packet size to 512 bytes (using the Packet Size value in the ), which is sufficient for most data transfer operations. 對於大部分的應用程式，預設封包大小是最佳的。For most applications, the default packet size is best. 可能的 512 到 32767 之間的位元組範圍內的值。 may be a value in the range of 512 and 32767 bytes. 如果值是在這個範圍之外，會產生例外狀況。An exception is generated if the value is outside this range. 將設定預設值為一個數字大於 8000 會導致多頁配置器使用的 SQL Server 執行個體，而不是最有效率的 SinglePage 配置器，減少整體延展性的 SQL Server 上的封包。Setting the default value to a number greater than 8000 will cause the packets to use the MultiPage allocator on the instance of SQL Server instead of the much more efficient SinglePage allocator, reducing the overall scalability of the SQL Server. 如需有關 SQL Server 如何使用記憶體的詳細資訊，請參閱[記憶體架構](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143705)SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中。For more information on how SQL Server uses memory, see [Memory Architecture](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143705) in SQL Server Books Online. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，包括設定`Packet Size`為 512，連接字串中。The following example creates a , including setting the `Packet Size` to 512 in the connection string. 它會顯示和主控台視窗中的屬性。It displays the and properties in the console window. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
